## EnvHemisphericAmbient.(constructor)

Creates an instance of EnvConstantAmbient

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(ambientUp: Vector4, ambientDown: Vector4);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ambientUp | [Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md) | The upside ambient color |
|  ambientDown | [Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md) | The downside ambient color |
